# behavior

**Instance Property**

The actual level of Writing Tools support the system provides for your view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var behavior: UIWritingToolsBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

The system chooses this value based on the device capabilities, and takes the value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWritingToolsCoordinator/preferredBehavior] property into consideration when making the choice. The value in this property is never the default option, and is instead one of the specific options such as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWritingToolsBehavior/none], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWritingToolsBehavior/limited], or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWritingToolsBehavior/complete].

## Configuring the experience

- **preferredBehavior**: The level of Writing Tools support you want the system to provide for your view.
- **preferredResultOptions**: The type of content you allow Writing Tools to generate for your custom text view.
- **resultOptions**: The type of content the system generates for your custom text view.
